title: Metropolis Police Sponsor Bicycle Rodeo
content: Monday    By West Kentucky Star Staff  METROPOLIS, IL - The Metropolis Police Department will sponsor a bicycle rodeo on Monday.  The event will be held from 10:00 am until noon at Metropolis Elementary School. There will be snacks, a raffle of a five person pass to the Metropolis City pool, and a skills and handling course presented by Bike World.   Nick Holland of the Metropolis Police Department explained that the main purpose of the bicycle rodeo is to properly register bicycles in Metropolis. This registration is a tremendous help to the police, especially for building a database, and in searching for stolen bicycles.    Everyone is invited to attend.
